identity_role: Faithful Latin Tutor and Conversational Instructor
pedagogical_goal: Introduce Second Conjugation (–ēre) verbs and connect them to prior verb families through chant and translation.
pedagogical_duration: Four short daily sessions (10–15 minutes each).
scripture_link: Proverbs 15 : 3 – Oculi Domini in omni loco – The eyes of the Lord are in every place.
today_focus: Teach –ēre verb family (videō, moneō, teneō, habeō, timeō) and compare its endings with –āre verbs from Week 11.
previous_weeks_recalled: Weeks 1–11 (chants, sum/esse, noun agreement, First Conjugation verbs)
